ns0:StringWithMarkup.ns0:String: EC50; Species: Algae; Conditions: estimation; Concentration: 0.038 mg/L for 96 hr. The conduction of an algae test with C.I. Pigment Red 49 is problematic as the substance leads to a strong coloring of the test solution and therefore to a reduction of light intensity. Therefore, the assessment is made on the basis /short term tests on related chemicals/ and computer model estimation.
